Articles.Content:
So I'm almost done making this part but I wanted to get some feedback and probably work on the texture a little bit more before I release it.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/Z3t5s)

I know it's not much but I plan on making a few different structural pieces, Got any ideas on what structural parts to make? Leave a comment and I'll reply back
I like it! I can only imagine the possibilities. Especially if you were to include junctions as well as additional angles. I say go for it bro

Off the top of my head I'd also like a T-junction, and a 4-way junction. Maybe something that could be the corner of a cube.

Really could get some mileage out of KIS and use this (and its future brethren) to make a little shack on Duna.

> 
> I like it! I can only imagine the possibilities. Especially if you were to include junctions as well as additional angles. I say go for it bro

Yeah I was planing on making at least a 45 degree angle, an extended version of the 90 degree bend, and some cross-joints and some T-joints
Good idea. Other than the obvious "T", "X" and bends into the third dimension nothing jumps to mind.
Very nice, I would suggest a 6 way strut connector, or like a strut adapter to mini fuel tank
